scheme_name: Pearce Zr/Y vs Zr Tectonic Discrimination
author: Sefy Levy
description: Distinguish between within-plate, MORB, and volcanic arc basalts using Zr/Y vs Zr (Pearce & Norry, 1979)
reference: Pearce, J.A. & Norry, M.J. (1979). Petrogenetic implications of Ti, Zr, Y, and Nb variations in volcanic rocks. Contributions to Mineralogy and Petrology, 69(1), 33-47.

classifications.name: WITHIN-PLATE BASALT (WPB)
classifications.description: High Zr/Y (>7) across all Zr concentrations

classifications.name: MID-OCEAN RIDGE BASALT (MORB)
classifications.description: Moderate Zr/Y (2â€“7) and wide range of Zr

classifications.name: VOLCANIC ARC BASALT (VAB)
classifications.description: Low Zr/Y (<3) and generally low Zr (<150 ppm)

classifications.name: TRANSITIONAL / UNKNOWN
classifications.description: Zr/Y between 3 and 7 but with ambiguous Zr
